Activity: Log in and check for any new emails from Data Analysts or Health Informatics Specialists regarding data updates.
Participate in a team meeting with all members to discuss collective goals for the week regarding data accuracy.
Work on data collection tasks, identifying any areas needing special focus to enhance data accuracy.
Finalize and submit any outstanding data entries from the week.
Collaborate with @Database Administrator (dba-1) to ensure the database structure allows for accurate data input.
Send a collaborative email to @IT Project Manager (itpm-1) seeking updates on any new EHR integration initiatives.
Wrap up work for the day, ensure all emails are addressed and prepare for end-of-week evaluations.
